feedback_text: My assignment file keeps stopping at 99 percent during upload. I tried three different Wi-Fi networks and it’s still stuck.
suggested_user_story: As a student, I want uploads to complete reliably so I don’t miss deadlines.
notes: Common student pain point during peak usage times.

feedback_text: I shared a folder with my colleague but she says she can’t edit anything even though I thought I gave her edit access.
suggested_user_story: As a collaborator, I want permission settings to be clearer so I know what access I'm granting.
notes: Common confusion between commenter vs editor roles.

feedback_text: I uploaded several documents this morning and none of them appear when I search for their names.
summary: Files not indexed quickly after upload
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want new files indexed quickly so search results stay accurate.

feedback_text: I edited a spreadsheet offline and now Drive made a duplicate version instead of merging my changes.
summary: Offline edits created duplicate file conflict
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want offline edits to merge reliably so I don’t manually compare duplicates.

feedback_text: My team reorganized folders in our Shared Drive and suddenly some people lost access.
summary: Permissions changed unexpectedly after folder reorganization
suggested_user_story: As a team member, I want predictable permission inheritance when reorganizing.

feedback_text: I marked files for offline use, but when I got on the plane only half were available.
summary: Offline availability not matching user expectation
suggested_user_story: As a traveler, I want clearer offline indicators so I know which files are stored locally.

feedback_text: Mobile search filters reset every time I scroll. Very annoying.
summary: Mobile search filters reset during use
suggested_user_story: As a mobile user, I want filters to stay applied so I can refine results.

feedback_text: PDF previews take forever to load.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want faster previews so I can scan documents quickly.

feedback_text: I get access request emails hours after they were sent.
suggested_user_story: As a file owner, I want timely notifications so I can approve requests promptly.

feedback_text: It’s so hard to understand what changed between versions.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want clearer version summaries so I can see key differences.

feedback_text: A folder vanished for ten minutes and then reappeared.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want Drive to show folders consistently so I don’t fear data loss.

feedback_text: Drive keeps defaulting to ‘Anyone with link’. Way too risky.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want safer sharing defaults to avoid accidental exposure.

feedback_text: Drive loads really slowly on my older computer.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want Drive to load efficiently even on older hardware.

feedback_text: I never know which trash a deleted file ends up in.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want consistent trash behavior so I know where items go.

feedback_text: The progress bar jumps from 10 percent to done but the file isn’t actually ready yet.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want accurate progress indicators so I trust upload status.
notes: Progress bar likely tied to metadata upload, not full content.

feedback_text: Copy link sometimes gives me the old link with previous permissions.
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want link sharing to always match current permissions.

feedback_text: I edited two files offline but only one synced when I reconnected.
suggested_user_story: As a commuter, I want offline changes to sync reliably so I don’t lose work.

feedback_text: Search keeps showing an old version of a file.
summary: Search result shows outdated file version
suggested_user_story: As a user, I want search to prioritize my most recent edit.

feedback_text: Mobile uploads sometimes just don’t appear and no error shows.
suggested_user_story: As a mobile user, I want clear upload feedback so I know if something fails.
notes: Silent failure is a serious issue.

feedback_text: Shared Drives with lots of folders load extremely slowly.
summary: Shared Drives load slowly when folder count is high
suggested_user_story: As a team member, I want Shared Drives to load smoothly so I can navigate faster.
